design_philosophy.visual_style: Dark Mode Only. Metallic surfaces, Neon data streams, HUD interfaces.
anti_patterns: No rounded 'friendly' SaaS corners - use chamfered or sharp edges
No purple/teal gradients - use stark Cyan/Black or Orange/Grey
No 'Inter' font for headings - use 'Rajdhani' or 'Orbitron'
No flat white text - use off-white or silver for better eye comfort in dark mode

backgroundImage.grid-pattern: linear-gradient(to right, #1f2937 1px, transparent 1px), linear-gradient(to bottom, #1f2937 1px, transparent 1px)

buttons.primary: bg-optimus-cyan/10 border border-optimus-cyan text-optimus-cyan hover:bg-optimus-cyan hover:text-black transition-all duration-300 uppercase tracking-widest text-xs font-bold px-6 py-3 rounded-none clip-path-chamfer
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-optimus-border text-optimus-silver hover:border-optimus-silver transition-all duration-300 uppercase tracking-widest text-xs font-bold px-6 py-3 rounded-none
buttons.danger: bg-optimus-orange/10 border border-optimus-orange text-optimus-orange hover:bg-optimus-orange hover:text-black transition-all duration-300 uppercase tracking-widest text-xs font-bold px-6 py-3 rounded-none

cards.hud_panel: bg-optimus-card/80 backdrop-blur-md border border-optimus-border relative overflow-hidden group hover:border-optimus-cyan/50 transition-colors duration-500
cards.hud_decoration: absolute top-0 left-0 w-2 h-2 border-t border-l border-optimus-cyan opacity-50 group-hover:opacity-100 transition-opacity

inputs.field: bg-black/50 border border-optimus-border text-optimus-silver focus:border-optimus-cyan focus:ring-1 focus:ring-optimus-cyan rounded-none p-3 font-mono text-sm placeholder:text-gray-700

dashboard.classes: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 gap-4 p-4 md:p-6 h-screen overflow-hidden bg-optimus-bg text-optimus-silver
areas: Status Ticker: col-span-3 row-span-1 border-t border-optimus-border flex items-center

landing.hero_section: col-span-full h-screen flex items-center justify-center relative overflow-hidden

effects: Scanlines: pointer-events-none fixed inset-0 z-50 bg-scanline bg-[length:100%_4px] opacity-10

assets.icons: Use 'lucide-react' with stroke-width={1.5} for a technical look. Preferred icons: Activity, Cpu, Radio, ShieldAlert, Zap, BoxSelect.

3d_integration.scene_setup: Canvas with transparent background. AmbientLight intensity 0.5. PointLight cyan color.
3d_integration.model_placeholder: Use a simple BoxGeometry with wireframe material if GLB not available, rotating slowly.

accessibility.contrast_check: Ensure Cyan text is only used on very dark backgrounds. Use White/Silver for body text.
accessibility.reduced_motion: Disable scanlines and 3D rotation if prefers-reduced-motion is true.
accessibility.screen_readers: All charts must have a hidden table summary or aria-label describing the trend.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS FIRST: Add the Google Fonts link to public/index.html
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js with the 'optimus' color palette immediately.
3. CLEANUP: Remove all default React logos and App.css styles. Reset to a blank canvas.
4. LAYOUT: Build the 'Shell' layout (Sidebar + Header + Main Content) using the Control Room Grid strategy.
5. COMPONENTS: Create a reusable 'HUDCard' component that implements the borders and corner decorations defined in 'components.cards'.
6. CHARTS: Use Recharts. Customize the Tooltip to look like a sci-fi popup (bg-black border-cyan).
7. 3D: Create a 'RobotPreview' component using R3F. If loading fails, fallback to a wireframe cube.
8. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to every interactive element (e.g., 'scenario-builder-drag-item', 'upload-dataset-btn').
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Avoid generic 'AI slop' designs. No centered text on landing pages unless it's a massive headline.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) sparingly - prefer sharp lines for this specific project.
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all.
